name: Gene-RGB
description:
Made for the Butterscotch ShenaniJam 2019!

How to play

Protect your base(s) from the invading shapes! Shoot your 2 beams at the nearby colours to combine them and destroy shapes of the same colour.  

ControlsWASDmovementLeft-clickshoot dna beam
(clicking again after already having 2 beams out removes both of them) Jam achievements

Theme chosen - DNA chaos

  • Healthy Living - Sleep for 8 hours per night, get an hour of exercise, and only eat healthy food for the duration of the jam
  • Mozart - Compose your own music.
  • Maverick - Your team size is 1.
Tools
  • Unity
  • Chiptone
  • Inkscape
  • Paint.net
  • Bosca Ceoil
